tool_description: Automatically detects the primary language of input text and identifies mixed-language content for appropriate processing by other language-specific tools.

text.description: Text to analyze for language detection

confidence_threshold.description: Minimum confidence level for language detection (0.1-1.0)

error_messages: Empty text: Provide text content for language detection.
Invalid confidence threshold: Must be between 0.1 and 1.0.
Text too short: Minimum 10 characters required for reliable language detection.
usage: Provide text and optionally set confidence threshold. Returns detected language with confidence scores and mixed-language analysis.

primary_language.description: Primary language code detected (e.g., en-US, es, fr)

confidence_score.description: Confidence score for primary language detection (0-1)

secondary_languages.description: Additional languages detected in mixed content

supported_for_correction.description: Whether detected language is supported by correction tools
